file_content.text: The Imperial warned you this would happen. Why couldn't you just let them go?
Shalim's expecting you at his new camp. We can take care of ourselves now.
I didn't kill these people. That Imperial did, and I made sure he paid for it.
This is war.
I never meant for this to happen. I thought I could stop him before he pulled the trigger.
I'm sorry. It was a mistake.
We'll have to leave the bodies. We barely have enough speeders as it is.
I don't answer to you. Just get these people out of here.
Shut up and do your job.
Y--yes, of course.
I should contact Shalim, let him know we're bringing wounded....
Thank goodness you're... wait, where is Mayor Erkens?
The mayor's dead. This whole mesa has become a combat zone, and it's crumbling to pieces. We need to evacuate the wounded right now.
She didn't make it.
We have more problems than Toborro. Imperial forces came here to retrieve samples of isotope-5. They killed the mayor.
We've got the Empire here.
What a loss--and now we have the Empire to contend with?
We've got bigger problems. It looks like Toborro has an army of those isotope-5 droids.
Toborro has many droids.
Then our jobs just got a lot harder.
We're ready to evacuate, but many of our people were wounded in the attack.
We've established a medical triage center. I'm sending the coordinates, Soler. Get your people to it.
I've also relocated to a new camp near the ark construction site. I'm transmitting coordinates. Meet me here to plot our strategy.
Have we managed to investigate Toborro's claims about the ark's fuel supply?
Any news on the ark?
You're concentrating all of your forces in one area. Toborro won't resist that temptation for long.
You've made yourself a target.
Our proximity to the ark limits the kinds of attacks he can make. Aerial bombardment is now off the menu.
Don't make this any more complicated than it has to be. Point me at Toborro, and I'll put an end to him.
That's simple: Kill Toborro.
If only it were that simple.
A Republic engineer just arrived. He's analyzing the ark schematics now. Get here as soon as you can.
